title: Writing of Clinical Rules for Digestive Diseases
snippet: We are looking for a Registered Nurse, Registered Dietitian, or MD to write a series of "clinical" rules that would generate alerts or a response to an individual's needs that have digestive diseases. We are collecting daily symptoms from patients, and we want to know, if they enter some symptoms, those people that we need to respond to immediately and those that we can put on a list to call. We have the inputs, and so with the inputs we want to generate a series of written rules for our response. Some experience in clinical aspects of those who have digestive diseases would be important.
